name: Delicious Ice Candy Maker
description:
Let's play amazing delicious ice candy maker game. Make your favourite ice candy step by step. It's amazing cooking game for cooking game lover. Follow one by one step and make your yummy ice candy. There are also so many items for decoration of your ice candy. Also so many face expression and many more for make yummy ice candy.

Features:
=======
- Easy to play.
- There are 2 flavour and 6 different shape for candy.
- Easy user interface.
- So many items for decoration.
- Supported IOS 11.

So are you ready for make Yummy ice candy? Download Now...

Don't forget review us!
